Just a quick question: Is Tuscon still emitting his wave while he is doing
=
all this? Keep in mind that while it is disrupting any codes the intruder
h=
as set up, it will be difficult for Tuscon to be stealthy while he is
emitt=
ing it, since it is quite 'LOUD' to anyone with the proper sensors. :)

- P=
reston

<div>Just a quick question: Is Tuscon still emitting his wave while he is d=
oing all this? Keep in mind that while it is disrupting any codes the intru=
der has set up, it will be difficult for Tuscon to be stealthy while he is =
emitting it, since it is quite 'LOUD' to anyone with the proper sen=
sors. :)</div>

<div>=A0</div>
<div>- Preston<br><br></div>

<div>
<div>
<div>
<p>After defusing th=
e bomb, Quickstride heaves a sigh of relief, which is well earned. He looks=
 over to Wing Caliber while holding his chest.<br><br>"Whewww, ohh boy=
, talk about a major pulsator stopper. I could so faint right now."<br=
>
<br>He catches his breath as he wipes off his forehead.<br><br>"I ho=
pe the rest of our team's havn' as much good luck as we're havi=
ng."<br><br>Meanwhile, Uproar gets the command to go after the intrude=
r and can hardly wait to pounce and maul his enemy. With a roar, he replies=
.<br>
<br>"You got it Sir! Consider this creep as good as junk!"<=
br><br>Meanwhile, Tucson too, approaches the ninja intruder, and ignores th=
at little warning about his energy reserves going low. He had dealt with in=
truders of the dark many times, and being visually impaired, he knew how to=
 unlock their secrets of steath. He nodds to Legacy's reply.<br>
<br>&q=
uot; Understood Legacy."<br><br>He replies with a silent message over =
the com link, to keep himself from making any noise. He switches his sonar =
systems to conscentrate on the intruder. He was very close now. His blips g=
etting stronger. With Hydras not too far behind, he realized he had to do w=
hat he had pulled on the old abandoned base while working with Lord Perseus=
. When in doubt, resort to isolation. He concentrates, listens, and deciphe=
rs that the ninja is within his range, in the same area. The dark was his e=
lement as well, as he soon finds a manual control to shut the doors sealing=
 himself and the ninja inside. With a narrow of his brow, he slaps his hand=
 against it, and then, waits to see if it works. <br>
<br>His intent was cl=
ear, he wanted that ninja.<br><br>"Rodimus, this is Tucson. I've a=
pproached the area where the intruder is located. I'm hoping the doors =
close properly to ensure capture. I sense this enemy is much like myself, a=
nd instead of putting Uproar and Leo ll in grave danger, I will take on the=
 intruder personally. He has crossed the line in my envronment, and it'=
s time he pays the price by someone who is as versed in stealth as he is. I=
 ask you to call back Uproar and Leo ll to prevent further harm to them.&qu=
ot;<br>
<br>His optics narrow. He draws Straight Shot in his hands, to begi=
n his little game of cat and mouse. <br><br>Outside the Ark, Night Shift qu=
ickly transforms and charges the enemy with a plasma riffle in hand, firing=
 rounds, hoping to strike at least Scourge or Cyclonus, in hopes to disable=
 them.<br>
<br>" We got some serious bolts ta pick with you punks!&quo=
t;<br><br>Rat Trap also fires his own weaponry.<br><br>"Yeah! Let'=
s see how you guys like be'n trapped like rats! CHAAARGE!"
